name: Chholar Daal with Mutton Kima
extreInfo: This recipe goes well with hot parathas.

ingredients.name: Garlic (Lasun)
ingredients.quantity: 6 flakes - ground to a fine paste

ingredients.name: Ginger (Ada)
ingredients.quantity: 25 gms ground to a fine paste

steps: Wash the cholar dal and boil till tender in a pressure cooker.
Heat oil in frying pan and lightly fry the onions.
Add ginger and garlic paste and stirfry till oil separates from the mixture.
Add minced mutton, turmeric powder, red chillie powder, sugar, salt, curd and stirfry for 5 minutes.
Add some water and boil the mixture till the mutton is tender and keep aside.
Heat the pure ghee in the frying pan.
Add cholar dal and the mutton kima mixture and bring to boil.
Blend the mixture thoroughly stirring continuously.
Your CHOLAR DAL WITH MUTTON KIMA is ready to be served.
